name: There Is No Light
description:
The entire population of the planet is eradicated by a global catastrophe. Now, the fate of the world as we know it lies on the shoulders of but one man. Battle your way through bloodthirsty demonic forces to bring order to the world… Or become the herald of its destruction.
A CITY, UNDERGROUND Set out on a perilous journey through an arresting blend of a post-apocalyptic setting and religious themes.
FUELED BY FURY Slay your enemies with unique abilities, powered by your Rage.
TRANSFORM THE WORLD Ever-shifting locations, that react and change according to your deeds - along with your character.
FREEDOM TO EXPLORE Engage the world your way - the non-linear structure of the game allows the player to navigate the world freely.
